title: Angus lost
creator_credit: Evergreen Productions, Firehouse Productions, John Sturner and Gary Templeton
brief_description: Angus is a very curious, clever Scottish terrier, whose curiosity gets him into a number of close scrapes. This is a live-action, non-verbal adaptation of Marjorie Flack’s classic book and is sure to delight audiences both young and old.
creator_credit_for_label: Evergreen Productions, Firehouse Productions, John Sturner and Gary Templeton
